column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Do they actually run camps associated with that ?
#Text=R2-45 camps ?
#Text=Never heard of it .
#Text=DM loves guns but there 's no camps for shooting .
#Text=What is the next step we should take in raising the general public 's awareness of the atrocities of the " Church " of Scientology .
#Text=Also , besides www.xenutv.com , what are some other , reputable , citable sources of information on these abuses ?
#Text=There are plenty of great sites starting with the granddaddy of them all — www.xenu.net. Professor David Touretzky 's various sites are well researched and important resources .
#Text=Stop-Narconon and such .
#Text=My favorite book on Scientology is Bare-Faced Messiah .
#Text=It and many others can now be read on the web .
#Text=I 'd like to do audiobook versions of them for people to download .
#Text=Where , oh where , is the time , however .
#Text=Why does Scientology accuse people of crimes when they are asked questions ?
#Text=Hubbard put it into writing .
#Text=" Always attack - Never defend . "
#Text=There are policy letters where he ordered people never to answer questions about Scientology but instead twist it around to the crimes of the critic .
#Text=So when you see that happening in my videos , you are hearing Hubbard 's words come through the Scientologist 's mouth , which is one of the reasons I never get mad at them .
#Text=This is what they are taught .
#Text=They literally ca n't think for themselves .
#Text=Why do you think Scientology dangerous ?
#Text=From a European ( French ) point of view there are many strange organizations in the United States ( Nazi party , many religious groups ) .
#Text=Why is Scientology your fight ?
#Text=I think Scientology is dangerous to individuals who find their realities stripped .
#Text=I think it 's dangerous to families when they are broken up by disconnection .
#Text=I think it 's dangerous to society when they write laws that our politicians back to attack psychiatry .
#Text=Anytime they stop free speech , I think that 's bad in general .
#Text=Scientology is my fight because others were too afraid to take them on .
#Text=I hate bullies .
#Text=Scientology ( while dangerous ) acts like a big school yard bully .
#Text=Now if that bully in 4th grade had a crack legal team and a gang of devoted followers who would do dirty tricks to send you to jail , a mental ward or the grave --
#Text=he would have been a real threat !
#Text=Scientology also brings together my general interest in cults , sci-fi and Hollywood in a unique way .
#Text=I never expected to pick a fight with a dangerous cult but someone had to stand up to them .
#Text=I thought I could help .
#Text=And that 's part of the reasons you support ' Anonymous ' and — apart from DDoS — their actions ?
